com.bazaarvoice

Class BazaarRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bazaarvoice.BazaarRequest

  • public class BazaarRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends and handles requests to the Bazaarvoice API. Both submissions and display requests are handled by this class. They are differentiated by calling the corresponding method to send the request and by passing an object of the corresponding subclass of BazaarParams.

    There are options for both display and submission using asynchronous requests, queued requests, and blocking requests.
